A good location

Approximate 68 incredible acres, triangular shaped peninsula, on the west coast of Cape Breton Nova Scotia, providing views of spectacular sunsets over the sea. The Cabot Links Golf Course, which was named by Golf Digest as the best new golf coarse of 2015, is 30 minutes away, and is driving development of the area.
